amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following: SEC. 4. FUNDING. Nothing in this Act or the amendments made by this Act shall be construed as authorizing appropriations to designate or otherwise create a new component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-834 to amend the bill to provide that nothing in it may be construed as authorizing appropriations for a new designation within the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
